mapper.select: SELECT bf.*, f.id f_id, f.file_name f_file_name, f.json f_json, f.data_uri f_data_uri, f.width f_width, f.height f_height, f.bg_color f_bg_color, f.grid_size f_grid_size, f.draw_grid f_draw_grid, f.router_default f_router_default, f.connector_default f_connector_default, f.is_public f_is_public, f.is_legal f_is_legal, f.is_share f_is_share, f.create_date f_create_date, f.modify_date f_modify_date, f.dead_share_date f_dead_share_date, f.consumer_id f_consumer_id FROM t_blueprint_flowcharts bf INNER JOIN t_flowcharts f ON bf.flowchart_id = f.id WHERE bf.id = #{id};
